languages.text: {n}В глазах Кибеллы поблескивает азарт.{/n} "То была славная слежка. Добыча угодила в кровавые сети и встретила конец — как и должно быть".

traits.locale_text: {n}В глазах Кибеллы поблескивает азарт.{/n} "Чэй-Хэй-Рьо. То была славная слежка. Добыча угодила в мои кровавые сети и встретила свой конец — как и должно было быть".

languages.text: {n}You catch a spark of excitement in Kibellah's eyes.{/n} "It was a good chase. My quarry caught itself in my web of blood and met its end there, as was its fate."
languages.original_text: {n}В глазах Кибеллы поблескивает азарт.{/n} "То была славная слежка. Добыча угодила в кровавые сети и встретила конец — как и должно быть".

traits.locale_text: {n}You catch a spark of excitement in Kibellah's eyes.{/n} "Chae-Hae-Rho. It was a good chase. My quarry was caught in my web of blood and met its end, as was its fate."

{n}You catch a spark of excitement in Kibellah's eyes.{/n} "It was a good chase. My quarry caught itself in my web of blood and met its end there, as was its fate."

languages.text: {n}Percibes un destello de entusiasmo en los ojos de Kibellah.{/n} «Ha sido una buena cacería. Mi presa quedó atrapada en mi red de sangre y encontró su fin en ella, como era su destino».
languages.original_text: {n}You catch a spark of excitement in Kibellah's eyes.{/n} "It was a good chase. My quarry caught itself in my web of blood and met its end there, as was its fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Percibes un destello de entusiasmo en los ojos de Kibellah.{/n} «Ha sido una buena cacería. Mi presa quedó atrapada en mi red de sangre y encontró su fin en ella, como era su destino».

languages.text: {n}あなたはキベラの目に宿った興奮の光に気づく。{/n}「楽しい追いかけっこだったわ。獲物は私の血の網にかかって、そのさだめである最期を遂げた」
languages.original_text: {n}You catch a spark of excitement in Kibellah's eyes.{/n} "It was a good chase. My quarry caught itself in my web of blood and met its end there, as was its fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたはキベラの目に宿った興奮の光に気づく。{/n}「楽しい追いかけっこだったわ。獲物は私の血の網にかかって、そのさだめである最期を遂げた」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈的目光中闪烁着兴奋的火花。{/n}“那是场精彩的角逐。我的猎物落入了我的血网之中，一命呜呼。这正是它应得的命运。”
languages.original_text: {n}You catch a spark of excitement in Kibellah's eyes.{/n} "It was a good chase. My quarry caught itself in my web of blood and met its end there, as was its fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈的目光中闪烁着兴奋的火花。{/n}“那是场精彩的角逐。我的猎物落入了我的血网之中，一命呜呼。这正是它应得的命运。”

languages.text: {n}Du erkennst einen Funken der Aufregung in Kibellahs Augen.{/n} "Das war eine gute Jagd. Meine Beute verfing sich in meinem Netz aus Blut und fand dort ihr Ende, ihrem Schicksal gemäß."
languages.original_text: {n}You catch a spark of excitement in Kibellah's eyes.{/n} "It was a good chase. My quarry caught itself in my web of blood and met its end there, as was its fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du erkennst einen Funken der Aufregung in Kibellahs Augen.{/n} "Das war eine gute Jagd. Meine Beute verfing sich in meinem Netz aus Blut und fand dort ihr Ende, ihrem Schicksal gemäß."

languages.text: {n}Vous décelez une étincelle d'excitation dans les yeux de Kibellah.{/n} « Ce fut une belle chasse. Ma proie s'est jetée dans ma toile de sang et elle y a trouvé la mort, comme le voulait son destin. »
languages.original_text: {n}You catch a spark of excitement in Kibellah's eyes.{/n} "It was a good chase. My quarry caught itself in my web of blood and met its end there, as was its fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous décelez une étincelle d'excitation dans les yeux de Kibellah.{/n} « Ce fut une belle chasse. Ma proie s'est jetée dans ma toile de sang et elle y a trouvé la mort, comme le voulait son destin. »

languages.original_text: {n}You catch a spark of excitement in Kibellah's eyes.{/n} "It was a good chase. My quarry caught itself in my web of blood and met its end there, as was its fate."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın gözlerinin heyecanla parıldadığını fark ediyorsun.{/n} "İyi bir av oldu. Avımı kandan ağımla yakaladım ve oracıkta canını aldım. Kaderinde de bu vardı zaten."
languages.original_text: {n}You catch a spark of excitement in Kibellah's eyes.{/n} "It was a good chase. My quarry caught itself in my web of blood and met its end there, as was its fate."
